hiveArticle.title: Discussion - Who Deserver Your Seat
hiveArticle.body:
So this Image was taken from a facebook page, and I wanted to discuss with you all that whom you think deserves your seat considering you are a healthy man. 

![FB_IMG_1522915967430.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZDPBCQcDNgW2sjf97wPMTNWpNQPGhs4EemXn99zsTGd2/FB_IMG_1522915967430.jpg)
Source : [Facebook](facebook.com)

As far as I am concerned, I am little confuse between the Old Lady and the Broken Leg Guy, as I can take the baby in my hand and the lady can stand. After thinking litlle, I came to a conclusion that the Old Lady (option B) needed the seat the most. Why because first of all her legs might not be so strong which can support the jerks and also shw will get tired really fast as opposed to the young guy. I am not sure what Zombie is doing in the bus, have to throw him out :P
